head.supplied: ¶ [We are happy to announce, by communication from Dr. Ferd. von Mueller himself, that he has not left the management of the Melbourne Botanic Garden, as some newspapers had announced.]...

div.p: To the Nuovo Giornale Botanico Italiano

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Notizie', Nuovo giornale botanico italiano, vol. 3 (1871), p 105, in a set of notes signed 'E. M.', who has not been identified. It is possible that the letter was sent to the Botanic Garden in Florence, where the journal was based, rather than to the journal.

p.seg: [Siamo lieti di fare sapere per comunicazione avuta dal Dr Ferd. von Mueller stesso, che egli non ha punto lasciata la direzione del Giardino botanico di Melbourne, come era stato annunziato da qualche giornale.]

div.p: [We are happy to announce, by communication from Dr. Ferd. von Mueller himself, that he has not left the management of the Melbourne Botanic Garden, as some newspapers had announced.]
